00212    // Inline methods

00214    /*
00215    * Return interval value.
00216    */
00217    inline int Actor::interval() const
00218    {  return interval_; }
00219 
00220    /*
00221    * Return true iff the iStep is a multiple of the interval.
00222    */
00223    inline bool Actor::isAtInterval(long iStep) const
00224    {  return (iStep%interval_ == 0); }
